metadata.synopsis: PAD played by the party when they enter an inccorect pincode to open the Great Door. Should incentivize players to keep on tryingMinsc can't be part of this one.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Run over pressure plates before S_LOW_CountingHouse_GreatDoor_97933ead-8014-4241-8d83-477e658d9b44 - chances are, you will enter the incorect pin like that

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Didn't work. Need to try a different sequence.
